events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position submitted earlier today.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under engineering roles based on the candidate's experience and skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage this candidate, ensuring smooth coordination through the interview process.
Conducted the initial screening call with the candidate to assess technical knowledge and motivation for the software engineer role.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm and confirming availability for technical interviews next week.
Scheduled the technical interview with the senior developer team for the candidate on June 15th at 10 AM.
The candidate completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidateâ€™s fit within the company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, with the candidate showing alignment with company values and clear communication skills.
An official offer was proposed to the candidate, including salary details and benefits tailored to their experience.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and requested a brief period to consider all details.
The candidate accepted the offer enthusiastically and confirmed their start date for the onboarding process.
The onboarding process has started with successful completion of all initial paperwork and introduction sessions.
The recruitment case is now closed after the candidate fully integrated into the engineering team and commenced work.
